mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_num AS reservation_num , r.member_id AS member_id , (SELECT m.member_name FROM members m WHERE m.member_id = r.member_id ) AS member_name , r.doctor_id AS doctor_id , TO_CHAR(r.reservation_date, 'hh24:mi') AS reservation_date , r.reservation_status AS reservation_status , r.reservation_payment AS reservation_payment , r.file_key AS file_key , r.patient_comments AS patient_comments FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN certificate c ON r.reservation_num = c.reservation_num WHERE r.doctor_id = #{doctorId} AND DATE(r.reservation_date) = CURDATE() AND c.reservation_num IS NULL ORDER BY CASE WHEN r.reservation_status = 'R' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END , r.reservation_date DESC , r.reservation_num ASC

SELECT r.reservation_num AS reservation_num , r.member_id AS member_id , (SELECT m.member_name FROM members m WHERE m.member_id = r.member_id ) AS member_name , r.doctor_id AS doctor_id , TO_CHAR(r.reservation_date, 'hh24:mi') AS reservation_date , r.reservation_status AS reservation_status , r.reservation_payment AS reservation_payment , r.file_key AS file_key , r.patient_comments AS patient_comments , c.certificate_status AS certificate_status FROM reservation r INNER JOIN certificate c ON r.reservation_num = c.reservation_num WHERE r.doctor_id = #{doctorId} AND status = 'UN' AND certificate_status = 'N' AND DATE(r.reservation_date) = CURDATE() ORDER BY r.reservation_date ASC, r.reservation_num ASC

SELECT r.reservation_num AS reservation_num , r.member_id AS member_id , (SELECT m.member_name FROM members m WHERE m.member_id = r.member_id ) AS member_name , r.doctor_id AS doctor_id , TO_CHAR(r.reservation_date, 'hh24:mi') AS reservation_date , r.reservation_status AS reservation_status , r.reservation_payment AS reservation_payment , r.file_key AS file_key , r.patient_comments AS patient_comments FROM reservation r INNER JOIN certificate c ON r.reservation_num = c.reservation_num WHERE r.doctor_id = #{doctorId} AND status = 'UY' AND certificate_status = 'Y' AND DATE(r.reservation_date) = CURDATE() ORDER BY r.reservation_date ASC, r.reservation_num ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation ( member_id, doctor_id, reservation_date, reservation_status, reservation_payment, file_key, patient_comments ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{doctorId}, #{reservationDate}, #{reservationStatus}, #{reservationPayment}, #{fileKey}, #{patientComments} )
